Column.Name: Chart Type - Value of Active Procurements
Chart Type - Number of Active Procurements
Module
Gantt Chart HTML
Show First Time Message
Column.DefaultValueFormula: EBMS_GET_PREFERENCE("Procurement - Hide First Time Message") <> TRUE

Binding.Expression: [Dashboard Data]
ARRAY_SELECT(EACH [Action], $(i, item) HASH_GET($item, "Action"))
ARRAY_SELECT( EACH [Action], $(i, item) HASH( "value", HASH_GET($item, "Action"), "text", "" ) )

RichLabel.Text:
<style type="text/css">.svg-report-icon 
{
  fill: #4682B4; background: white;
}
.svg-report-icon:hover 
{
  fill: white; background: #4682B4;
}
.core-horizontal-spacer
{
  height: calc(100% - 2px); 
  border-bottom: 1px solid #D5D1D1; 
  width: 100%;
}
.core-export-report-container
{
  display: table; 
  height: 100%;
}
.core-export-report-title
{
  display: table-cell; 
  padding: 15px 65px 15px 2px;
  font-size: 11pt;
  color: #4682B4;
  vertical-align: middle;
}
.core-dashboard-reports-box:hover
{
  border: 1px solid #4682B4;
}
.core-dashboard-reports-box
{
  background: rgba(226, 226, 226, 0.2); 
  border: 1px solid #E2E2E2;
  box-shadow: 0px 0px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15); 
  border-radius: 5px; 
  display: table; 
  height:100%; 
  width:98%; 
  box-sizing: border-box;
  transition: all .5s ease;
}
</style>

TextCriterion.Text: CURRENT_USER FAST_EQUAL_TO [Procurement Manager] OR CURRENT_USER FAST_EQUAL_TO [Procurement Officer]

CASE --WHEN [Status] = 'Awarded' --THEN 'white'
WHEN [Status] = 'Rejected' THEN 'white'
WHEN [Status] = 'Expired' THEN 'white'
WHEN [Status] = 'Cancelled' THEN '#b3b3b3'
ELSE 'black' END

Binding.Expression: OR( AND( [Navigation] = "Dashboard", ARRAY_INDEXOF([Current User Dashboard Preference], "All Records") > 0, N(HASH_GET(HASH_GET([Aggregate Results], "14"), "Aggregate")) > 0 ), AND( [Navigation] = "Reports", [Report Type] = "Premade reports" ), AND( [Navigation] = "Find procurement" ) )

ChangeFieldValues.Description: Populate Selection Action Data / Clear report type

Navigate.UrlTemplate:
{ IF( HASH_GET([Selected Action Data], "Navigation Type") = "URL", HASH_GET([Selected Action Data], "URL"),
HASH_GET([Selected Action Data], "Navigation Type") = "Existing Record", "records/" & URLENCODE(HASH_GET([Selected Action Data], "EForm Target")) & "/" & URLENCODE(HASH_GET([Selected Action Data], "RecordID")) ) }

FormulaCriterion.Formula: AND( HASH_GET([Selected Action Data], "Open Mode") = "Default", HASH_GET([Selected Action Data], "Navigation Type") = "Existing Record" )
